name: Tasty
description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site

api_methods.name: tips/list
api_methods.description: This endpoint is used to load tips (reviews)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of recipe id returned in .../recipes/list .../feeds/list .../recipes/list-similarities endpoints

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the latest tips for the Tasty lasagna recipe?
I want to read 10 reviews for the chocolate chip cookies recipe, starting from the fifth one.
Give me the first 5 tips people have shared about the vegan chili recipe.
What are some helpful suggestions for making the Tasty chicken parmesan?
List all the reviews for the banana bread recipe, but skip the first 20.
Show me 15 user tips for the homemade pizza recipe.
Could you find the most recent 3 tips for the Tasty beef stew?
I’d like to see tips 11 through 20 for the apple pie recipe.
Pull up all the advice users have given for the shrimp tacos recipe.
Can you display the next 7 reviews for the Tasty pancakes, starting after the first 7?
